title: Pakistan national cricket team
summary: The Pakistan national cricket team, popularly referred to as the Shaheens (lit.â€‰'Falcons'),[12][13] Green Shirts,[14] Men in Green,[15] and Cornered Tigers[16][17] is administered by the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB). The team is a Full Member of the International Cricket Council, and participates in Test, One Day International (ODI) and Twenty20 International cricket matches.
